pullRequest.body: It turns out @101damnations and I had independently written `CoalgebraCat`. She got in first, and I'm happy to use that version but want one more instance.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9566993092/job/26373604934)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9566993092/job/26373604502)
This PR looks good to me, except doesn't this line also remove the `isCoalgebra_comul, isCoalgebra_counit` projections? I think I use those in various other files

also I guess this would be more general
```suggestion
    (forget (CoalgebraCat.{v} R)).ReflectsIsomorphisms where
  reflects {X Y} f _ := by
    let i := asIso ((forget (CoalgebraCat.{v} R)).map f)
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(Algebra/Category/CoalgebraCat): minor changes
